Sentencas: In this paper, Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/ySZ anodes for a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) were prepared by tape casting and vacuum impregnation.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By this method, the Ni content in the anode could be reduced compared to the traditional tape casting method.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that adding CeO2 into the Ni/YSZ anode by a Ni(NO3)(2) and Ce(NO3)(3) mixed impregnation could further enhance cell performance.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This was investigated in H-2 at 1073 K. XRD patterns indicated that CeO2 and Ni were separate phases, and the CeO2 addition could enhance the Ni dispersion on the YSZ framework surface which was observed by SEM images.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was shown that adding CeO2 into the Ni anodes could decrease the cell polarization resistance.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum power density for cells with 25 wt.% Ni, 5 wt.% CeO2-25 wt.% Ni/YSZ, or 10 wt.% CeO2-25 wt.% Ni/YSZ anode was 230 mW cm(-2), 420 mW cm(-2) and 530 mWcm(-2), respectively, in H-2 at 1073 K.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The OCV for these cells was 1.05-1.09 V, indicating that a dense electrolyte film was obtained by co-firing porous YSZ layer and dense YSZ layer.
Titulo: Ni/YSZ and Ni-CeO2/YSZ anodes prepared by impregnation for solid oxide fuel cells
